title: Collaborative Gender/Sexual Minority Education Design Workshop for Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Strengthening integrated curriculum design competencies linked to science education and establishing practical environments for digital tool utilization

learning_goals: Design three or more gender/LGBTQ+ education scenarios using the Learning Labs methodology.
Submit revised materials that improve the inclusivity of educational resources by 20% or more based on peer feedback.

Learners can select three cases of cultural conflicts that occur during the collaborative learning process and propose resolution strategies within 500 characters for each case, incorporating three elements: cultural sensitivity, communication strategies, and a conflict resolution framework.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
